contentrichtext.text: == Summary == {{Information | Description = Terran Confederation Star This starburst originates from the [[Wing Commander (computer game)|Wing Commander]] universe, in which it is the symbol of the Terran Confederation, and appears on all documentation from ''Wing Commander Armada'' on. It appears in the courtroom during Admiral [[Geoffrey Tolwyn]]'s tribunal at the end of ''Wing Commander IV'', and on the flag in the movie introduction. | Source = As for the actual image, I created it myself, using gmax and Arcsoft Photostudio software (as I lacked vector graphics software at the time). | Date = | Author = [[User:Bob_McDob|Bob_McDob]] ([[User talk:Bob_McDob|talk]]) ([[Special:ListFiles/Bob_McDob|Uploads]]) | Permission = | other_versions = }} == Licensing == {{GFDL-en|migration=relicense}} {{Copy to Wikimedia Commons|bot=Svenbot}}
